Title: Potomanto
Writer: Shirley Frimpong-Manso, Senanu Gbedawo, Shirley Nana Akua Manso (story)
Actors: Elorm Adablah, Edem Agbenyame, Frank Aidam, Evelyn Akpene
Plot: An angry ex-police officer's mission to catch cheating women turns fatal when he stumbles into a diabolical plot of 'illegal organ harvesting' and the young hustlers who are lured into making deadly sacrifices for a chance abroad.
